example.text: the few blocks ' walk between Grand Central Terminal and the Waldorf Astoria Hotel in midtown Manhattan

example.name: autogen1
example.text: He smoked Toronto in the playoffs with six hits , seven walks and eight stolen bases in 22 at bats , and continued that by going 3-for-3 at the plate Sunday , along with walking , stealing a base and scoring a run .
